latestUpdate.body: Latest open issue updated: #39 Assemble System for testing on Gazebo

issues.title: Assemble System for testing on Gazebo
Acquire and setup rtos for esp32 controllers
System schematics for motors and sensors
Dedicated power system compliance (no benchtop PSU)
Impact robustness test plan (withstand 25-lb weight drop from 5 ft)
Curvilinear path test (10 ft in ≤ 90 s) with payload
Straight path test (10 ft in ≤ 1 min) with payload
Create budget slide (purchased vs required; totals)
Create schedule slide (weekly granularity; dates not “Week 7”)
Section — Project management (schedule, responsibilities, budget, risk)
Proposal skeleton + formatting (title page, TOC, page numbers)
Project management slide (schedule + responsibilities + budget + risk)
Trade study plan (what decisions must be made by Feb 13?)
Draft one-slide “system depiction” for early alignment
